    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String schoolId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String matricno, java.time.LocalDate localDate, char gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String p, java.lang.String email)
      Creates a new student
      Parameters:
      schoolId - Name of school this student is enrolled in
      name - Name of this student
      matricno - Matriculation number of this student
      localDate - Date of birth of this student
      gender - Gender of this student
      nationality - Nationality of this student
      p - Password of this student
      email - email of this student
